headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Issi Rally
content:
Rain, sleet, snow, traffic jams, crowds of people. There is nothing the all-purpose, all-speed Weeny Issi Rally canâ€™t drive through. Just throw this sleeper into gear and watch it wake Los Santos up like a can of intravenous Junk.

Available now from Southern San Andreas Super Autos. Unleash the full potential with Hao's Special Works upgrades.
